issues.message: Consider using more general type 'Akka.Cluster.Metrics.MixMetricsSelectorBase' instead of 'Akka.Cluster.Metrics.MixMetricsSelector'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary<T, int>' instead of 'System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableDictionary<T, int>'.
